description: This file defines the `CalculatorButton` widget for a Flutter calculator app, rendering a styled, pressable button with label text and emphasis variants, utilizing InkWell for tap feedback and responsiveness based on size.

classes.name: CalculatorButton
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a rounded, emphasis-variant button with a label, handling tap interactions and accessibility semantics.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the `CalculatorButton`, applying theme-based background and foreground colors, calculating border radius, and setting text styles scaled to the button size.
